data.englishTranslation: May Allah bless you, and shower His blessings upon you, and join you together in goodness.
data.transliteration: Baarakallaahu laka, wa baaraka 'alayka, wa jama'a baynakumaa fee khayrin.
data.arabicVerse: بَارَكَ اللَّهُ لَكَ، وَبَارَكَ عَلَيْكَ، وَجَمَعَ بَيْنَكُمَا فِي خَيْرٍ
data.reference: [Hisnul 190] Abû Dâwud [2130], At-Tirmidhî [1091], and Ibn Mâjah [1905]. Also see Ŝaĥîĥ Ibn Mâjah (1/324).
